content:
hi i don't know where to start 
so i gonna with my fear ahh it is you  i am really afraid of you,  i know you might not wonder but that's the 
reason i can't start a conversation (especially with female or elders)  but i do message you i know that is freaking 
disrespectful but i can't help it, for another example for your birthday i brought few amul chocolate bars 
and a printed birthday card but i could never gather the courage sorry i had to throw this away just few days 
back cause of it's expiry date i saw it like every day till this day of writing

supportResponse.message: Give yourself permission to feel all your emotions without judgment.
supportResponse.encouragement: Remember, you're doing better than you think.
